titles.title: Labor Relations First Contract Negotiations Act of 2002
To amend the National Labor Relations Act to require the arbitration of initial contract negotiation disputes, and for other purposes.
Labor Relations First Contract Negotiations Act of 2002

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Employer-Employee Relations.

bill.summary: Labor Relations First Contract Negotiations Act of 2002 (sic) - Amends the National Labor Relations Act to require mediation and, if necessary, binding arbitration of initial contract negotiation disputes.
